General.Name: Greenland Resources Inc
General.Description: Greenland Resources Inc., a mining company, engages in acquisition, exploration, and development of mineral projects in Greenland. Its flagship project is the 100% owned Malmbjerg molybdenum project located in eastern Greenland. The company was formerly known as Primera Bioscience Research Inc. and changed its name to Greenland Resources Inc. in June 2014. Greenland Resources Inc. was incorporated in 2008 and is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
